segments.text: Merry Christmas , sweetie . How's your brother enjoying Taiwan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ryan says he wants to stay . I think he's in love with some girl who designs fruit platters ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No ! Christmas without him is bad enough . So , honey , do you have cold feet yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , especially since Jack didn't take care of the plane reservations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not until the 31st . So can you change the church reservations ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid not . The church is booked until the year 2001 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then where will we have the ceremony ? At home ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll have to . We'll rehearse on the 1st and have the wedding on the 2nd .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry , dear . I'm a great host . Now get some rest . Merry Christmas .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Merry Christmas , Mom . I love you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I love you , too . And forgive Jack . He's doing his best .
segments.speaker: S1
